embeds.title: Elemental Lord Information
embeds.description:
> **Duration**: 3 days
> **Frequency**: Weekly (Saturday 0 UTC - Sunday 23:59 UTC)
> **Alternate Names**: Elemental
> **Event Type**: Player (against Server)

fields.name: How It Works
fields.value:
There are four Elemental Lords (Archer, Fire, Ice, and Goblin). Each is located at the 4 corners of the Scorched Land around the throne on the server. Attack each Lord 5 times to accumulate points based on damage dealt.

To maximize damage, use the right troops to get the 30% bonus damage. Reconfigure troops if necessary.

fields.name: Rewards
fields.value: There will be ranked rewards for each Elemental Lord within the server.

fields.name: Embassy Recommendation
fields.value: Always do this event for the hero cards and heals.
